name: Please do not delete "My Computer"!
description:
The game is made for: Clicker Jam Spring 2023

A simple clicker made in the style of WINDOW 95. The goal of the game is to prevent the cursor from getting to "My Computer" and delete it. The difficulty increases with time, and a boss appears at the end of each level.

The visuals and code are completely drawn and written by ME.

 Except for the icon: "My Computer".

All sounds are made in Bfxr.

Soundtrack: LINK.

Controls:

- Attack: Left Mouse Click / Right Mouse Click

- Reload game: SPACE

- Quit: ESC
